title: 07/02/2021 - HOUR 1 - Kawhi, Lillard, College
itunes:title: 07/02/2021 - HOUR 1 - Kawhi, Lillard, College
description:
There are two NBA teams who are rumored to be interested in Kawhi Leonard

Could Damian Lillard end up on the Lakers?

College sports will be fine, people need to relax


Guest: Chris Broussard
